p:
The other portion of the turmeric powder was separated by column chromatography on silica gel (Vetec, 60-270 mesh), eluted with hexane:ethyl acetate (1:1), to obtain curcuminoid pigments. The curcuminoid pigments consisted of a mixture of bisdemethoxycurcumin, curcumin, and demethoxycurcumin.
43
